definitions.definition: A very young human , particularly from birth to a couple of years old or until walking is fully mastered .
A very young human , even if not yet born .
examples: Her baby had always been active, even before he was born, when he would kick her bladder.

definitions.definition: Any very young animal , especially a vertebrate ; many species have specific names for their babies, such as kittens for the babies of cats , puppies for the babies of dogs , and chicks for the babies of birds . See Category:Baby animals for more.
A person who is immature , infantile , or feeble .
examples: Stand up for yourself – don't be such a baby !

definitions.definition: A person who is new to or inexperienced in something.
examples: I only qualified as an architect this summer, so I'm still a baby .

definitions.definition: The lastborn of a family ; the youngest sibling , irrespective of age .
examples: Adam is the baby of the family.

definitions.definition: A person's romantic partner ; a term of endearment used to refer to or address e.g. one's girlfriend , boyfriend , or spouse .
examples: Too busy thinking about my baby , and I ain't got time for nothing else.

definitions.definition: A form of address to a person considered to be attractive .
examples: Hey baby , what are you doing later?

definitions.definition: A concept or creation endeared by its creator .
examples: This test program I've designed is my new baby .
You need to talk to John about that – it's his baby .
See my new car here? I can't wait to take this baby for a drive.

definitions.definition: A small image of an infant ; a doll .
One who is new to an identity or community .

main_definition: A very young human , particularly from birth to a couple of years old or until walking is fully mastered .
secondary_definitions: A very young human , even if not yet born .

Any very young animal , especially a vertebrate ; many species have specific names for their babies, such as kittens for the babies of cats , puppies for the babies of dogs , and chicks for the babies of birds . See Category:Baby animals for more.
A person who is immature , infantile , or feeble .
A person who is new to or inexperienced in something.
The lastborn of a family ; the youngest sibling , irrespective of age .
A person's romantic partner ; a term of endearment used to refer to or address e.g. one's girlfriend , boyfriend , or spouse .
( informal ) A form of address to a person considered to be attractive .
A concept or creation endeared by its creator .
( archaic ) A small image of an infant ; a doll .
( often attributive ) One who is new to an identity or community .
